properties.entry: SELECT CATEGORY_NO , CATEGORY_NAME FROM CONTACTS_CATEGORY WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT C.CONTACTS_NO , C.CONTACTS_NAME , COUNT(CM.CONTACTS_NO) AS "COUNT" FROM CONTACTS "C" LEFT JOIN CONTACTS_MEMBER "CM" ON (C.CONTACTS_NO = CM.CONTACTS_NO) WHERE C.OWNER_NO = ? AND C.CONTACTS_TYPE = 'P' AND C.STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY C.CONTACTS_NO, C.CONTACTS_NAME ORDER BY C.CONTACTS_NO

SELECT C.CONTACTS_NO , C.CONTACTS_NAME , COUNT(CM.CONTACTS_NO) AS "COUNT" FROM CONTACTS "C" LEFT JOIN CONTACTS_MEMBER "CM" ON (C.CONTACTS_NO = CM.CONTACTS_NO) WHERE C.CATEGORY_NO = ? AND C.CONTACTS_TYPE = 'S' AND C.STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY C.CONTACTS_NO, C.CONTACTS_NAME ORDER BY C.CONTACTS_NO

SELECT U.USER_NO , U.USER_ID , U.USER_NAME , CASE WHEN ? = '1' THEN U.PHONE WHEN U.PHONE_PUBLIC = 'N' THEN '비공개' ELSE U.PHONE END AS "PHONE" , TO_CHAR(U.BIRTHDAY, 'FMMM"월" DD"일"') AS "BIRTHDAY" , U.PROFILE_FILE_NO , CASE WHEN U.USER_AUTH = 'A' THEN '선생님' ELSE '학생' END AS "ROLE" , CS.STAR FROM USERS "U" LEFT JOIN CONTACTS_STAR "CS" ON (U.USER_NO = CS.OTHER_USER_NO AND CS.CURRENT_USER_NO = ?) WHERE U.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY U.USER_AUTH, U.USER_NAME

SELECT U.USER_NO , U.USER_ID , U.USER_NAME , CASE WHEN ? = '1' THEN U.PHONE WHEN U.PHONE_PUBLIC = 'N' THEN '비공개' ELSE U.PHONE END AS "PHONE" , TO_CHAR(U.BIRTHDAY, 'FMMM"월" DD"일"') "BIRTHDAY" , U.PROFILE_FILE_NO , CASE WHEN CM.ROLE = 'L' THEN '팀장' WHEN CM.ROLE = 'F' THEN '팀원' ELSE '-' END AS "ROLE" , CS.STAR FROM USERS U JOIN CONTACTS_MEMBER "CM" ON (U.USER_NO = CM.USER_NO) LEFT JOIN CONTACTS_STAR "CS" ON (U.USER_NO = CS.OTHER_USER_NO AND CS.CURRENT_USER_NO = ?) WHERE U.STATUS = 'Y' AND CM.CONTACTS_NO = ? ORDER BY CM.ROLE DESC, U.USER_NAME

SELECT U.USER_NO , U.USER_ID , U.USER_NAME , CASE WHEN ? = '1' THEN U.PHONE WHEN U.PHONE_PUBLIC = 'N' THEN '비공개' ELSE U.PHONE END AS "PHONE" , TO_CHAR(U.BIRTHDAY, 'FMMM"월" DD"일"') "BIRTHDAY" , U.PROFILE_FILE_NO , CASE WHEN CM.ROLE = 'L' THEN '팀장' WHEN CM.ROLE = 'F' THEN '팀원' ELSE '-' END AS "ROLE" , CS.STAR FROM USERS U JOIN CONTACTS_MEMBER CM ON U.USER_NO = CM.USER_NO LEFT JOIN CONTACTS_STAR CS ON U.USER_NO = CS.OTHER_USER_NO AND CS.CURRENT_USER_NO = ? WHERE U.STATUS = 'Y' AND CM.CONTACTS_NO IN (SELECT CONTACTS_NO FROM CONTACTS WHERE CATEGORY_NO = ?) ORDER BY CM.ROLE DESC, U.USER_NAME

SELECT U.USER_NO , U.USER_ID , U.USER_NAME , CASE WHEN ? = '1' THEN U.PHONE WHEN U.PHONE_PUBLIC = 'N' THEN '비공개' ELSE U.PHONE END AS "PHONE" , TO_CHAR(U.BIRTHDAY, 'FMMM"월" DD"일"') AS "BIRTHDAY" , U.PROFILE_FILE_NO , CASE WHEN U.USER_AUTH = 'A' THEN '선생님' ELSE '학생' END AS "ROLE" , CS.STAR FROM USERS "U" LEFT JOIN CONTACTS_STAR "CS" ON (U.USER_NO = CS.OTHER_USER_NO AND CS.CURRENT_USER_NO = ?) WHERE U.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CS.STAR ASC, U.USER_NAME ASC

SELECT U.USER_NO , U.USER_ID , U.USER_NAME , CASE WHEN ? = '1' THEN U.PHONE WHEN U.PHONE_PUBLIC = 'N' THEN '비공개' ELSE U.PHONE END AS "PHONE" , TO_CHAR(U.BIRTHDAY, 'FMMM"월" DD"일"') AS "BIRTHDAY" , U.PROFILE_FILE_NO , CASE WHEN U.USER_AUTH = 'A' THEN '선생님' ELSE '학생' END AS "ROLE" , CS.STAR FROM USERS "U" LEFT JOIN CONTACTS_STAR "CS" ON (U.USER_NO = CS.OTHER_USER_NO AND CS.CURRENT_USER_NO = ?) WHERE U.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CS.STAR DESC, U.USER_NAME ASC

SELECT U.USER_NO , U.USER_ID , U.USER_NAME , CASE WHEN ? = '1' THEN U.PHONE WHEN U.PHONE_PUBLIC = 'N' THEN '비공개' ELSE U.PHONE END AS "PHONE" , TO_CHAR(U.BIRTHDAY, 'FMMM"월" DD"일"') AS "BIRTHDAY" , U.PROFILE_FILE_NO , CASE WHEN U.USER_AUTH = 'A' THEN '선생님' ELSE '학생' END AS "ROLE" , CS.STAR FROM USERS "U" LEFT JOIN CONTACTS_STAR "CS" ON (U.USER_NO = CS.OTHER_USER_NO AND CS.CURRENT_USER_NO = ?) WHERE U.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY U.USER_NAME ASC

SELECT U.USER_NO , U.USER_ID , U.USER_NAME , CASE WHEN ? = '1' THEN U.PHONE WHEN U.PHONE_PUBLIC = 'N' THEN '비공개' ELSE U.PHONE END AS "PHONE" , TO_CHAR(U.BIRTHDAY, 'FMMM"월" DD"일"') AS "BIRTHDAY" , U.PROFILE_FILE_NO , CASE WHEN U.USER_AUTH = 'A' THEN '선생님' ELSE '학생' END AS "ROLE" , CS.STAR FROM USERS "U" LEFT JOIN CONTACTS_STAR "CS" ON (U.USER_NO = CS.OTHER_USER_NO AND CS.CURRENT_USER_NO = ?) WHERE U.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY U.USER_NAME DESC

SELECT U.USER_NO , U.USER_ID , U.USER_NAME , CASE WHEN ? = '1' THEN U.PHONE WHEN U.PHONE_PUBLIC = 'N' THEN '비공개' ELSE U.PHONE END AS "PHONE" , TO_CHAR(U.BIRTHDAY, 'FMMM"월" DD"일"') AS "BIRTHDAY" , U.PROFILE_FILE_NO , CASE WHEN U.USER_AUTH = 'A' THEN '선생님' ELSE '학생' END AS "ROLE" , CS.STAR FROM USERS "U" LEFT JOIN CONTACTS_STAR "CS" ON (U.USER_NO = CS.OTHER_USER_NO AND CS.CURRENT_USER_NO = ?) WHERE U.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY U.USER_ID ASC

SELECT U.USER_NO , U.USER_ID , U.USER_NAME , CASE WHEN ? = '1' THEN U.PHONE WHEN U.PHONE_PUBLIC = 'N' THEN '비공개' ELSE U.PHONE END AS "PHONE" , TO_CHAR(U.BIRTHDAY, 'FMMM"월" DD"일"') AS "BIRTHDAY" , U.PROFILE_FILE_NO , CASE WHEN U.USER_AUTH = 'A' THEN '선생님' ELSE '학생' END AS "ROLE" , CS.STAR FROM USERS "U" LEFT JOIN CONTACTS_STAR "CS" ON (U.USER_NO = CS.OTHER_USER_NO AND CS.CURRENT_USER_NO = ?) WHERE U.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY U.USER_ID DESC

SELECT U.USER_NO , U.USER_ID , U.USER_NAME , CASE WHEN ? = '1' THEN U.PHONE WHEN U.PHONE_PUBLIC = 'N' THEN '비공개' ELSE U.PHONE END AS "PHONE" , TO_CHAR(U.BIRTHDAY, 'FMMM"월" DD"일"') AS "BIRTHDAY" , U.PROFILE_FILE_NO , CASE WHEN U.USER_AUTH = 'A' THEN '선생님' ELSE '학생' END AS "ROLE" , CS.STAR FROM USERS "U" LEFT JOIN CONTACTS_STAR "CS" ON (U.USER_NO = CS.OTHER_USER_NO AND CS.CURRENT_USER_NO = ?) WHERE U.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY ROLE ASC, U.USER_NAME ASC

SELECT U.USER_NO , U.USER_ID , U.USER_NAME , CASE WHEN ? = '1' THEN U.PHONE WHEN U.PHONE_PUBLIC = 'N' THEN '비공개' ELSE U.PHONE END AS "PHONE" , TO_CHAR(U.BIRTHDAY, 'FMMM"월" DD"일"') AS "BIRTHDAY" , U.PROFILE_FILE_NO , CASE WHEN U.USER_AUTH = 'A' THEN '선생님' ELSE '학생' END AS "ROLE" , CS.STAR FROM USERS "U" LEFT JOIN CONTACTS_STAR "CS" ON (U.USER_NO = CS.OTHER_USER_NO AND CS.CURRENT_USER_NO = ?) WHERE U.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY ROLE DESC, U.USER_NAME ASC

SELECT U.USER_NO , U.USER_ID , U.USER_NAME , CASE WHEN ? = '1' THEN U.PHONE WHEN U.PHONE_PUBLIC = 'N' THEN '비공개' ELSE U.PHONE END AS "PHONE" , TO_CHAR(U.BIRTHDAY, 'FMMM"월" DD"일"') AS "BIRTHDAY" , U.PROFILE_FILE_NO , CASE WHEN U.USER_AUTH = 'A' THEN '선생님' ELSE '학생' END AS "ROLE" , CS.STAR FROM USERS "U" LEFT JOIN CONTACTS_STAR "CS" ON (U.USER_NO = CS.OTHER_USER_NO AND CS.CURRENT_USER_NO = ?) WHERE U.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY EXTRACT(MONTH FROM U.BIRTHDAY) ASC, EXTRACT(DAY FROM U.BIRTHDAY) ASC, U.USER_NAME ASC

SELECT U.USER_NO , U.USER_ID , U.USER_NAME , CASE WHEN ? = '1' THEN U.PHONE WHEN U.PHONE_PUBLIC = 'N' THEN '비공개' ELSE U.PHONE END AS "PHONE" , TO_CHAR(U.BIRTHDAY, 'FMMM"월" DD"일"') AS "BIRTHDAY" , U.PROFILE_FILE_NO , CASE WHEN U.USER_AUTH = 'A' THEN '선생님' ELSE '학생' END AS "ROLE" , CS.STAR FROM USERS "U" LEFT JOIN CONTACTS_STAR "CS" ON (U.USER_NO = CS.OTHER_USER_NO AND CS.CURRENT_USER_NO = ?) WHERE U.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY EXTRACT(MONTH FROM U.BIRTHDAY) DESC, EXTRACT(DAY FROM U.BIRTHDAY) DESC, U.USER_NAME ASC

SELECT U.USER_NO , U.USER_ID , U.USER_NAME , CASE WHEN ? = '1' THEN U.PHONE WHEN U.PHONE_PUBLIC = 'N' THEN '비공개' ELSE U.PHONE END AS "PHONE" , TO_CHAR(U.BIRTHDAY, 'FMMM"월" DD"일"') AS "BIRTHDAY" , U.PROFILE_FILE_NO , CASE WHEN U.USER_AUTH = 'A' THEN '선생님' ELSE '학생' END AS "ROLE" , CS.STAR FROM USERS "U" LEFT JOIN CONTACTS_STAR "CS" ON (U.USER_NO = CS.OTHER_USER_NO AND CS.CURRENT_USER_NO = ?) WHERE U.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY PHONE ASC

SELECT U.USER_NO , U.USER_ID , U.USER_NAME , CASE WHEN ? = '1' THEN U.PHONE WHEN U.PHONE_PUBLIC = 'N' THEN '비공개' ELSE U.PHONE END AS "PHONE" , TO_CHAR(U.BIRTHDAY, 'FMMM"월" DD"일"') AS "BIRTHDAY" , U.PROFILE_FILE_NO , CASE WHEN U.USER_AUTH = 'A' THEN '선생님' ELSE '학생' END AS "ROLE" , CS.STAR FROM USERS "U" LEFT JOIN CONTACTS_STAR "CS" ON (U.USER_NO = CS.OTHER_USER_NO AND CS.CURRENT_USER_NO = ?) SELECT U.USER_NO , U.USER_ID , U.USER_NAME , CASE WHEN ? = '1' THEN U.PHONE WHEN U.PHONE_PUBLIC = 'N' THEN '비공개' ELSE U.PHONE END AS "PHONE" , TO_CHAR(U.BIRTHDAY, 'FMMM"월" DD"일"') "BIRTHDAY" , U.PROFILE_FILE_NO , CASE WHEN CM.ROLE = 'L' THEN '팀장' WHEN CM.ROLE = 'F' THEN '팀원' ELSE '-' END AS "ROLE" , CS.STAR FROM USERS U JOIN CONTACTS_MEMBER "CM" ON (U.USER_NO = CM.USER_NO) LEFT JOIN CONTACTS_STAR "CS" ON (U.USER_NO = CS.OTHER_USER_NO AND CS.CURRENT_USER_NO = ?) WHERE U.STATUS = 'Y' AND CM.CONTACTS_NO = ? ORDER BY CS.STAR ASC, U.USER_NAME ASC

SELECT U.USER_NO , U.USER_ID , U.USER_NAME , CASE WHEN ? = '1' THEN U.PHONE WHEN U.PHONE_PUBLIC = 'N' THEN '비공개' ELSE U.PHONE END AS "PHONE" , TO_CHAR(U.BIRTHDAY, 'FMMM"월" DD"일"') "BIRTHDAY" , U.PROFILE_FILE_NO , CASE WHEN CM.ROLE = 'L' THEN '팀장' WHEN CM.ROLE = 'F' THEN '팀원' ELSE '-' END AS "ROLE" , CS.STAR FROM USERS U JOIN CONTACTS_MEMBER CM ON U.USER_NO = CM.USER_NO LEFT JOIN CONTACTS_STAR CS ON U.USER_NO = CS.OTHER_USER_NO AND CS.CURRENT_USER_NO = ? WHERE U.STATUS = 'Y' AND CM.CONTACTS_NO IN (SELECT CONTACTS_NO FROM CONTACTS WHERE CATEGORY_NO = ?) ORDER BY U.USER_ID ASC

SELECT U.USER_NO , U.USER_ID , U.USER_NAME , CASE WHEN ? = '1' THEN U.PHONE WHEN U.PHONE_PUBLIC = 'N' THEN '비공개' ELSE U.PHONE END AS "PHONE" , TO_CHAR(U.BIRTHDAY, 'FMMM"월" DD"일"') "BIRTHDAY" , U.PROFILE_FILE_NO , CASE WHEN CM.ROLE = 'L' THEN '팀장' WHEN CM.ROLE = 'F' THEN '팀원' ELSE '-' END AS "ROLE" , CS.STAR FROM USERS U JOIN CONTACTS_MEMBER CM ON U.USER_NO = CM.USER_NO LEFT JOIN CONTACTS_STAR CS ON U.USER_NO = CS.OTHER_USER_NO AND CS.CURRENT_USER_NO = ? WHERE U.STATUS = 'Y' AND CM.CONTACTS_NO IN (SELECT CONTACTS_NO FROM CONTACTS WHERE CATEGORY_NO = ?) ORDER BY U.USER_ID DESC

SELECT U.USER_NO , U.USER_ID , U.USER_NAME , CASE WHEN ? = '1' THEN U.PHONE WHEN U.PHONE_PUBLIC = 'N' THEN '비공개' ELSE U.PHONE END AS "PHONE" , TO_CHAR(U.BIRTHDAY, 'FMMM"월" DD"일"') "BIRTHDAY" , U.PROFILE_FILE_NO , CASE WHEN CM.ROLE = 'L' THEN '팀장' WHEN CM.ROLE = 'F' THEN '팀원' ELSE '-' END AS "ROLE" , CS.STAR FROM USERS U JOIN CONTACTS_MEMBER CM ON U.USER_NO = CM.USER_NO LEFT JOIN CONTACTS_STAR CS ON U.USER_NO = CS.OTHER_USER_NO AND CS.CURRENT_USER_NO = ? WHERE U.STATUS = 'Y' AND CM.CONTACTS_NO IN (SELECT CONTACTS_NO FROM CONTACTS WHERE CATEGORY_NO = ?) ORDER BY CM.ROLE ASC, U.USER_NAME ASC

SELECT U.USER_NO , U.USER_ID , U.USER_NAME , CASE WHEN ? = '1' THEN U.PHONE WHEN U.PHONE_PUBLIC = 'N' THEN '비공개' ELSE U.PHONE END AS "PHONE" , TO_CHAR(U.BIRTHDAY, 'FMMM"월" DD"일"') "BIRTHDAY" , U.PROFILE_FILE_NO , CASE WHEN CM.ROLE = 'L' THEN '팀장' WHEN CM.ROLE = 'F' THEN '팀원' ELSE '-' END AS "ROLE" , CS.STAR FROM USERS U JOIN CONTACTS_MEMBER CM ON U.USER_NO = CM.USER_NO LEFT JOIN CONTACTS_STAR CS ON U.USER_NO = CS.OTHER_USER_NO AND CS.CURRENT_USER_NO = ? WHERE U.STATUS = 'Y' AND CM.CONTACTS_NO IN (SELECT CONTACTS_NO FROM CONTACTS WHERE CATEGORY_NO = ?) ORDER BY CM.ROLE DESC, U.USER_NAME ASC

SELECT U.USER_NO , U.USER_ID , U.USER_NAME , CASE WHEN ? = '1' THEN U.PHONE WHEN U.PHONE_PUBLIC = 'N' THEN '비공개' ELSE U.PHONE END AS "PHONE" , TO_CHAR(U.BIRTHDAY, 'FMMM"월" DD"일"') AS "BIRTHDAY" , U.PROFILE_FILE_NO , CASE WHEN CM.ROLE = 'L' THEN '팀장' WHEN CM.ROLE = 'F' THEN '팀원' ELSE '-' END AS "ROLE" , CS.STAR FROM USERS U JOIN CONTACTS_MEMBER CM ON U.USER_NO = CM.USER_NO LEFT JOIN CONTACTS_STAR CS ON U.USER_NO = CS.OTHER_USER_NO AND CS.CURRENT_USER_NO = ? WHERE U.STATUS = 'Y' AND CM.CONTACTS_NO IN (SELECT CONTACTS_NO FROM CONTACTS WHERE CATEGORY_NO = ?) ORDER BY EXTRACT(MONTH FROM U.BIRTHDAY) ASC, EXTRACT(DAY FROM U.BIRTHDAY) ASC, U.USER_NAME ASC

SELECT U.USER_NO , U.USER_ID , U.USER_NAME , CASE WHEN ? = '1' THEN U.PHONE WHEN U.PHONE_PUBLIC = 'N' THEN '비공개' ELSE U.PHONE END AS "PHONE" , TO_CHAR(U.BIRTHDAY, 'FMMM"월" DD"일"') AS "BIRTHDAY" , U.PROFILE_FILE_NO , CASE WHEN CM.ROLE = 'L' THEN '팀장' WHEN CM.ROLE = 'F' THEN '팀원' ELSE '-' END AS "ROLE" , CS.STAR FROM USERS U JOIN CONTACTS_MEMBER CM ON U.USER_NO = CM.USER_NO LEFT JOIN CONTACTS_STAR CS ON U.USER_NO = CS.OTHER_USER_NO AND CS.CURRENT_USER_NO = ? WHERE U.STATUS = 'Y' AND CM.CONTACTS_NO IN (SELECT CONTACTS_NO FROM CONTACTS WHERE CATEGORY_NO = ?) ORDER BY EXTRACT(MONTH FROM U.BIRTHDAY) DESC, EXTRACT(DAY FROM U.BIRTHDAY) DESC, U.USER_NAME ASC

SELECT U.USER_NO , U.USER_ID , U.USER_NAME , CASE WHEN ? = '1' THEN U.PHONE WHEN U.PHONE_PUBLIC = 'N' THEN '비공개' ELSE U.PHONE END AS "PHONE" , TO_CHAR(U.BIRTHDAY, 'FMMM"월" DD"일"') "BIRTHDAY" , U.PROFILE_FILE_NO , CASE WHEN CM.ROLE = 'L' THEN '팀장' WHEN CM.ROLE = 'F' THEN '팀원' ELSE '-' END AS "ROLE" , CS.STAR FROM USERS U JOIN CONTACTS_MEMBER CM ON U.USER_NO = CM.USER_NO LEFT JOIN CONTACTS_STAR CS ON U.USER_NO = CS.OTHER_USER_NO AND CS.CURRENT_USER_NO = ? WHERE U.STATUS = 'Y' AND CM.CONTACTS_NO IN (SELECT CONTACTS_NO FROM CONTACTS WHERE CATEGORY_NO = ?) ORDER BY PHONE ASC, U.USER_NAME ASC

SELECT U.USER_NO , U.USER_ID , U.USER_NAME , CASE WHEN ? = '1' THEN U.PHONE WHEN U.PHONE_PUBLIC = 'N' THEN '비공개' ELSE U.PHONE END AS "PHONE" , TO_CHAR(U.BIRTHDAY, 'FMMM"월" DD"일"') "BIRTHDAY" , U.PROFILE_FILE_NO , CASE WHEN CM.ROLE = 'L' THEN '팀장' WHEN CM.ROLE = 'F' THEN '팀원' ELSE '-' END AS "ROLE" , CS.STAR FROM USERS U JOIN CONTACTS_MEMBER CM ON U.USER_NO = CM.USER_NO LEFT JOIN CONTACTS_STAR CS ON U.USER_NO = CS.OTHER_USER_NO AND CS.CURRENT_USER_NO = ? WHERE U.STATUS = 'Y' AND CM.CONTACTS_NO IN (SELECT CONTACTS_NO FROM CONTACTS WHERE CATEGORY_NO = ?) ORDER BY PHONE DESC, U.USER_NAME ASC
INSERT INTO CONTACTS_STAR ( STAR_NO , CURRENT_USER_NO , OTHER_USER_NO , STAR ) VALUES ( SEQ_CONTACTS_STARNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , 'Y' )
DELETE FROM CONTACTS_STAR WHERE CURRENT_USER_NO = ? AND OTHER_USER_NO = ?
SELECT CONTACTS_NO , CONTACTS_NAME FROM CONTACTS WHERE OWNER_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO CONTACTS_MEMBER ( CONTACTS_NO , USER_NO , ROLE ) VALUES ( ? , ? , NULL )
